SEARCH
Package Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player.Player
public class Player extends Object
The player class are where most of the player related functions are in. Functions such as leveling up, registering the farmertype, increasing the objectcoins, and more...

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      The constructor for the player class.

  • Method Details

    • buySeed

      public void buySeed(Tile tile, int plantDay, Crop cropSeed, MyFarm farm)
      Buying seeds automatically plants the crop seed. It also takes from the player's wallet, depending on the crop price.
      Parameters:
      tile - the targeted tile for planting.
      plantDay - takes the plant day of the plant.
      cropSeed - the crop that is going to be planted.
      farm - the farm where all farm tiles are contained.

    • harvestTile

      public void harvestTile(Tile tile, int currentDay)
      The harvestTile function harvests the crop in the tile, this also takes into consideration when the harvest time is. It also checks the status of the crop whether it's withered, harvestable, or growing.
      Parameters:
      tile - the targeted tile for harvesting
      currentDay - the current day count of the farm

    • checkLevelUp

      public void checkLevelUp()
      Checks if the player is eligible to level up and updates their level accordingly.

    • register

      public void register()
      The register function decides whether the farmer is eligible to register for a new farmer type. If the farmer is eligible, he can then register for the next more advanced farmer type.

    • showMessage

      public void showMessage(String message)
      Helper function that shows the imput message as a pop-up.
      Parameters:
      message - text to be displayed on the pop-up.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      The getter function for the level of the player. Player gains 1 level for every 100 experience points.
      Returns:
      level the level of the player

    • getExperience

      public double getExperience()
      The getter function for the experience of the player
      Returns:
      experience the experience of the player

    • getFarmerType

      public Farmer getFarmerType()
      The getter function for the farmer type.
      Returns:
      farmerType the current farmer type of the player.

    • getObjectcoins

      public double getObjectcoins()
      The getter function for objectCoins.
      Returns:
      objectCoin the player's current object coin amount

    • subtractObjectcoins

      public void subtractObjectcoins(double cost)
      The subtractObjectcoins function subtracts the amount of cost to the current amount of objectCoins
      Parameters:
      cost - the cost of transaction.

    • addObjectcoins

      public void addObjectcoins(double gain)
      addObjectcoins adds to the current object coins of the player depending on the gains input.
      Parameters:
      gain - the player's gain from the transaction

    • addExperience

      public void addExperience(double gain)
      The addExperience function adds the gained experience to the current overall experience of the player.
      Parameters:
      gain - the player's gain from the transaction

    • getTool

      public Tools getTool(int index)
      Gets the appropriate tool based on the index input. 0: Shovel 1: WaterCan 2: Pickaxe 3: Fertilizer 4: Plow
      Parameters:
      index - the index of a specific tool.
      Returns:
      the chosen tool.

    • playerReset

      public void playerReset()
      a function to reset all the player stats when the game starts again.
